original: @227b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @227b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba s'a ra sa mutstsha ya pra ka ra na /
analyzed: sarba s'a ra sa mutstsha ya pra ka ra na /
translated: Sarvasārasamuccayaprakaraṇa

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa /
analyzed: snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa /
translated: The Chapter on the Compendium of All Essences

original: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the guru and the Buddha.

original: gang de dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: gang de dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: That which, by its very nature,

original: snying la bde byed nyams myong ba //
analyzed: snying la bde byed nyams myong ba //
translated: Is experienced as blissful in the heart,

original: de yang kun du rtog pa tsam //
analyzed: de yang kun du rtog pa tsam //
translated: That too is mere conceptualization.

original: 'dod chags bral ba'i dngos po gang //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral ba'i dngos po gang //
translated: Whatever is free from attachment,🔽That alone is the supreme cause of existence.

original: de ni gcig tu srid rgyu'i mchog / gang zhig yid kyis skyes pa yi //
analyzed: de ni gcig tu srid rgyu'i mchog / gang zhig yid kyis skyes pa yi //
translated: Whatever arises in the mind,

original: rnam par rtog pa gang dag kyang //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gang dag kyang //
translated: Even those conceptual thoughts,

original: de nyid rang bzhin yin phyir te //
analyzed: de nyid rang bzhin yin phyir te //
translated: Are of that very nature.

original: snang zhing rgyu ba 'di dag las //
analyzed: snang zhing rgyu ba 'di dag las //
translated: Apart from these appearances and movements,

original: mya ngan 'das pa gzhan du ni //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa gzhan du ni //
translated: Nirvāṇa does not exist elsewhere.

original: yod min yul ni tsal yang //
analyzed: yod min yul ni tsal yang //
translated: Even if the object is sought,

original: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems //
translated: The mind itself is non-conceptual.

original: rnam rtog spangs pa de bzhin te //
analyzed: rnam rtog spangs pa de bzhin te //
translated: Likewise, the abandonment of conceptual thoughts

original: mya ngan 'das pa zhes brtag go //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa zhes brtag go //
translated: Is imagined to be nirvāṇa.

original: gnyis med mya ngan 'das pa min //
analyzed: gnyis med mya ngan 'das pa min //
translated: Non-dual nirvāṇa is not
The cycle of existence.

original: ba'ang ma yin pa kho na //
analyzed: ba'ang ma yin pa kho na //
translated: It is not a non-entity.🔽The procedure of the individual refutations

original: so sor 'gegs cho ga gang yin dang // so sor 'gag byar 'gegs pa yi //
analyzed: so sor 'gegs cho ga gang yin dang // so sor 'gag byar 'gegs pa yi //
translated: And the refutation of the refutable

original: gsum gyi dngos po'ang med pas na //
analyzed: gsum gyi dngos po'ang med pas na //
translated: Are also non-existent in the three times.

original: gang gis gang zhig ji ltar 'grub //
analyzed: gang gis gang zhig ji ltar 'grub //
translated: By what, and who, and how are they established?

original: yul ni dngos med gnyis yin no //
analyzed: yul ni dngos med gnyis yin no //
translated: The object is a non-entity, a duality.

original: so sor 'gegs pa'i bye brag ci //
analyzed: so sor 'gegs pa'i bye brag ci //
translated: What is the difference between the individual refutations?

original: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pas //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pas //
translated: Like the sky-flower and so forth,

original: cir yang mthong zhing rgyas pa bzhin //
analyzed: cir yang mthong zhing rgyas pa bzhin //
translated: Anything can be seen and elaborated.

original: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of non-production,

original: bden pa'i dngos po sbyin snang ba //
analyzed: bden pa'i dngos po sbyin snang ba //
translated: The appearance of giving a true entity

original: rnam rtog stobs las bsal ba la //
analyzed: rnam rtog stobs las bsal ba la //
translated: Is removed by the power of conceptualization.

original: bus pa'i 'bras bu ngo mtshar che //
analyzed: bus pa'i 'bras bu ngo mtshar che //
translated: The result of a child is amazing.🔽Just as a hungry child

original: ji ltar bus pa bkres pa dag / sor mo rang gi khar bcug nas //🔽nu zho 'bab pa lta bu ni //
analyzed: ji ltar bus pa bkres pa dag / sor mo rang gi khar bcug nas // nu zho 'bab pa lta bu ni //
translated: Puts his finger in his mouth,🔽And

original: mchil ma 'thungs pas du ba med //
analyzed: mchil ma 'thungs pas du ba med //
translated: By drinking the saliva, he is not sad.

original: de lta bas na 'bras rmongs pas //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'bras rmongs pas //
translated: Therefore, due to the delusion of results,

original: mya ngan 'das la sogs par byed //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das la sogs par byed //
translated: Nirvāṇa and so forth are created.

original: bde ba thob par 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: bde ba thob par 'dod pa yi //
translated: The individual who desires to attain happiness

original: so so'i skye bo de nyid dman //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo de nyid dman //
translated: Is inferior in reality.

original: 'gro rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bas //
analyzed: 'gro rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bas //
translated: Since beings are suffering in this way,

original: thob par gyur pa mi mnyam ste //🔽drud pa las byung me yis ni //
analyzed: thob par gyur pa mi mnyam ste // drud pa las byung me yis ni //
translated: the attainment of the two is not equal.🔽Just as bamboo burns

original: 'od ma tshig gyur ji bzhin no //
analyzed: 'od ma tshig gyur ji bzhin no //
translated: with the fire that arises from friction,🔽having abandoned what is called

original: chags dang chags bral zhes bya ba //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral zhes bya ba //
translated: attachment and nonattachment,

original: rnam par spangs nas mnyam gzhag na //
analyzed: rnam par spangs nas mnyam gzhag na //
translated: one rests in equipoise.

original: sdug bsngal med cing bde ba med //
analyzed: sdug bsngal med cing bde ba med //
translated: There is neither suffering nor happiness,

original: de nyid mthong bar som nyi med //🔽snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa /
analyzed: de nyid mthong bar som nyi med // snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa /
translated: and one has no doubt about seeing reality.🔽The chapter on the essence of the compendium is complete.

original: slob dpon chen po shr'i a'a nanda badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon chen po shr'i a'a nanda badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The great master Śrī Ānandavajra is the author.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the Indian abbot Vajrapāṇi and the Tibetan translator Rma ban Chöbar.
